trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje przycisk, który umożliwia użytkownikowi w celu przełączania się między różnymi <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>Tryby w siatce właściwości.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.
Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs> event.
trans-unit.target: Określa, jaki typ <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"> </xref> do wyświetlenia po otrzymaniu <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> and if that is <xref:System.Boolean.True>, sets up the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: Sprawdza, czy <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>został zmieniony (lub zysku lub straty) jego właścicielem <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>i w razie oznacza to <xref:System.Boolean.True>, konfiguruje <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>należy przełączyć do trybu.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która, gdy <xref:System.Boolean.True>, oznacza, że <> </> *> jest obliczana automatycznie, aby dopasować <> </> *> z właścicielem <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: W przeciwnym razie oparciu Przełącz do trybu <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>Właściwości.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> automatycznie przechodzi w tryb edycji jego <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Rejestruje właściwości zależności które, gdy <xref:System.Boolean.True>, oznacza, że <> </> *> jest obliczana automatycznie, aby dopasować <> </> *> z właścicielem <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: W przeciwnym razie oparciu Przełącz do trybu <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>Właściwości.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Tryb edycji, aby przełączyć się do kiedy <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> zostanie kliknięty.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Rejestruje właściwości zależności, który pobiera lub ustawia tryb docelowego podczas <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"> </xref> zostanie kliknięty.
